Styliani Pantela

stylianipantela@gmail.com


Hello World!

I am a software engineer at Vertica, a modern column store DBMS used by Intuit, Etsy, Aol, Uber etc. Here is one of the projects I recently worked on that we published at the New Engalnd Database Day of 2017. Directed Queries

I also serve as co-chair for DataGals, the former Hewlett Packard Enterprise and now Microfocus wide group for women in technical career paths. Checkout: DataGals Year in Review

In my free time I like to read, run, climb and play board games. I am also Harvard '15 and RSI '10.

Checkout my github if you are interested in past projects I have worked on and connect with me on LinkedIn. For more details also take a look at my Resume.

Quotes

This is a collection of quotes that have stuck with me over time.

English
In most cases, people, even wicked people, are far more naive and simple-hearted than one generally assumes. And so are we.
― Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Brothers Karamazov

Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love.
― Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Brothers Karamazov

One day we lose the person we love. Anyone who is unable to sustain that loss fails as a human being and does not deserve our sympathy.
― Sandor Marai, Embers

In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.
― Albert Camus, Return to Tipasa (published in the Myth of Sisyphus)

Greek
Ό,τι δεν συνέβη ποτέ, είναι ό,τι δεν ποθήσαμε αρκετά.
― Νίκος Καζαντζάκης

Η στερνή, η πιο ιερή μορφή θεωρίας είναι η πράξη.
― Νίκος Καζαντζάκης

Σαν τη λογιάζεις μια δουλειά, όρτσα και μη φοβάσαι
αμόλα τη, τη νιότη σου και μην τηνε λυπάσαι.
― Κρητική Μαντινάδα

Μια ανεξερεύνητη ζωή, δεν αξίζει να τη ζεις.
― Σωκράτης
